name: Evil Eye Mesmerism
desc: When your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) in Attack Position while you control an "Evil Eye" monster whose ATK is higher than that monster's: Activate this card by targeting 1 of those monsters; take control of it. It is also treated as an "Evil Eye" monster while "Evil Eye of Selene" is in your Spell & Trap Zone. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card. You can only activate 1 "Death Control of the Evil Eye" per turn.
